sentences.en: B : A Pullman is a sleeping car and a coach is a sitting car.
sentences.cn: 卧车 是可睡觉的车厢而普通车是有座位的车厢.

sentences.en: Can I get a Pullman seat?
sentences.cn: 我能买到卧铺票 吗 ?

sentences.en: He bought two tickets and Pullman berths.
sentences.cn: 他买了两张车票加头等卧铺票.

sentences.en: It was a pleasure to meet you during your visit to Pullman.
sentences.cn: 非常高兴能在你视察普尔曼期间见到你.

sentences.en: Launched in Paris, Pullman a new hotel brand for ACCOR, the international French Hotel Group.
sentences.cn: 雅高,来自法国的一家国际化酒店管理集团;铂尔曼,发起于巴黎, 雅高旗下的新酒店品牌.

sentences.en: Many Christian readers will recoil in horror at Mr Pullman's plunge into heresy.
sentences.cn: 许多基督徒读者会因为恐惧普尔曼先生书中突然蹦出的“异端邪说”而回避此书.

sentences.en: Philip Pullman addresses the apparent separateness of his subject's divinity and humanity in a provocative way.
sentences.cn: 菲利普?普尔曼则是以一种极为挑衅的方式诠释了主人公的神性与人性两种显著特质.

sentences.en: Pullman is a brand of international 5 star hotels and resorts dedicated to business travellers.
sentences.cn: 铂尔曼是致力于服务商务旅行者的国际五星级酒店及度假村的品牌.

sentences.en: Pullman is a new hotel brand with new attitude to travel.
sentences.cn: 铂尔曼是诠释全新态度旅行的新酒店品牌.

sentences.en: Sailafeinamo pull this name is Philip Pullman to draw up a telephone directory of the time.
sentences.cn: 塞拉菲娜·帕可拉这个名字是菲利普·普尔曼浏览电话簿的时候借鉴过来的.

words.tran_cn: 铂尔曼（雅高旗下一个新的五星级酒店品牌）；卧车

trans.tran_cn: 普尔曼式客车，普尔曼式卧车
trans.tran_en: A Pullman is a type of train that is extremely comfortable and luxurious. You can also refer to a Pullman train.
